description: Describes a simple network address translation schema.
title: Network Address translation IP Address and/or Port

id.description: Globally unique identifier for translation policy

match_source_ip.description: Optional. If supplied, translate only if sender ip matches

match_source_port.description: Optional. If supplied, translate only if sender port matches

match_destination_ip.description: Optional. If supplied, translate only if destination  ip matches

match_destination_port.description: Optional. If supplied, translate only if sender port matches

translated_source_ip.description: Optional. If present, translate source to this IP if match condition(s) are true

translated_source_port.description: Optional. If present, translate source port to this port if match condition(s) are true

translated_destination_ip.description: Optional. If present, translate destination to this IP if match condition(s) are true

translated_destination_port.description: Optional. If present, translate destination to this port if match condition(s) are true
